column5: too little to late. they have been there for over a decade.
too little to late. they have been there for over a decade.  It's never too late to nuke an entire river/canal.  Especially when that's the only place they're coming from.
Lip service, if the US was really concerned they'd close the canal.

there have been escapees and yes they will thrive in the great lakes. a gut punch from polictics. while we can create weapons, invade countrys but we cant protect our own homeland. that's my rant. wheres my hockey gear. im going carp batting.

maybe you can poison the whole canal... the asian carp has it in lock down so all the other species are dead anyways. kill them all and reintroduce the native species back. i'm no expert so I know if my idea is stupid or legit.

Survival of the fittest  Natural Selection will play its course  Just a matter of time  The fishing might suck in the short term but in about a few hundred to a thousand years some form of normalcy will be achieved.

Survival of the fittest  Natural Selection will play its course  Just a matter of time  The fishing might suck in the short term but in about a few hundred to a thousand years some form of normalcy will be achieved.  Did you forget the /sarcasm at the end of your reply?
